FandomActivity

Class FandomPost

  • java.lang.Object
    • FandomActivity.FandomActivityElement
      • FandomActivity.FandomPost
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FandomArticleComment, FandomPoll, FandomReply, FandomWallPost

    public class FandomPost
extends FandomActivityElement
    Represents a Fandom post.
    Author:
    Mika Thein
    See Also:
    FandomActivity.getRecentForumPosts(int), FandomActivity.getRecentWallPosts(int), FandomActivity.getRecentArticleComments(int)

    • Constructor Detail

      • FandomPost

        public FandomPost(java.lang.String title,
                  java.lang.String rawContent,
                  long id,
                  long siteId,
                  long latestRevId,
                  FandomPostAuthor author,
                  long epochSecond,
                  int position,
                  int upvoteCount,
                  FandomThread.Builder threadBuilder)
        Creates a new FandomPost instance (should not be used manually!).

        Use FandomActivity instead.

        Parameters:
        title - the title
        rawContent - the content in plain text
        id - the ID
        siteId - the site ID
        latestRevId - the latest revision ID
        author - the author
        epochSecond - the epoch seconds
        position - the position
        upvoteCount - the amount of upvotes
        threadBuilder - the thread builder

        Use FandomActivity instead.

        rawContent - the content in plain text
        id - the ID
        siteId - the site ID

        position - the position
        upvoteCount - the amount of upvotes
        thread - the thread

    • Method Detail

      • getThread

        public FandomThread getThread()
        Returns:

      • getPostById

        public static FandomPost getPostById(long postId,
                                     Fandom fandom)
        Returns a Fandom forum post by its ID.
        Currently, only FandomPolls, FandomReplys and FandomPost (at the forum) can be retrieved!
        Parameters:
        postId - the post ID
        fandom - the Fandom
        Returns:
        the Fandom post as FandomPoll, FandomReply or FandomPost
